sys_update_xml.name: sys_dictionary_u_catalog_config_u_code_snippet
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update><sys_dictionary action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE" element="u_code_snippet" table="u_catalog_config"><active>true</active><array>false</array><array_denormalized>false</array_denormalized><attributes/><audit>false</audit><calculation><![CDATA[// Build snippet to check Conditions
var snippet = "";

if(current.u_condition_type == 'Script'){
	snippet += "// Condition to check before running code execution block\n"+
		"if(conditionScript()){\n";
	
} else if(current.u_condition_type == 'Question Answer'){
	snippet += "// Condition to check before running code execution block\n"+
		"if(current.variables."+current.u_question+" == '"+current.u_answer+"'){\n";
	
}else if(current.u_condition_type == 'Condition Builder'){
	snippet += "// Condition to check before running code execution block\n"+
		"if(GlideFilter.checkRecord(current, '"+current.u_condition+"')){\n";
	
}
var advancedScript;
if(current.u_advanced){
	advancedScript = "    "+new String(current.u_execution_script).replace(/\n/g,"    ")+"\n";
}


// Build snippet to 

if(current.u_type == "Task Assignment"){
	snippet += "    task.assignment_group = '"+current.u_assignment_group+"';\n\n";
	
	if(advancedScript){
		snippet += advancedScript;
	}
	
} else if(current.u_type == "Approval"){
		
	snippet+="    var answer = [];\n";
	
	if(current.u_approval_group)
		snippet+="    answer.push('"+current.u_approval_group.sys_id+"');\n";
	
	if(current.u_approver)
		snippet+="    answer.push('"+current.u_approver.sys_id+"');\n\n";
	
	if(advancedScript)
		snippet += advancedScript+"\n\n";
	
} else if(current.u_type == "SLA"){
	
	var slas = current.u_sla_s.split(",");
	
	snippet += '    task.u_config_sla = "'+slas[0];
	
	for (i = 1; i < slas.length; i++){
		snippet += ','+slas[i];
	}
	
	snippet +='";\n\n';
	
	if(advancedScript)
		snippet += advancedScript;
	
}

if((current.u_condition_type == 'Script') || (current.u_condition_type == 'Question Answer') || (current.u_condition_type == 'Condition Builder')){
	snippet += "}\n\n";
}

if(current.u_condition_type == 'Script'){
	snippet += current.u_condition_script+"\n";
} 

if(current.u_type == "Question Choice"){
	snippet = "";
	
}
]]></calculation><choice/><choice_field/><choice_table/><column_label>Code that will be executed by workflow</column_label><comments/><create_roles/><default_value/><defaultsort/><delete_roles/><dependent/><dependent_on_field/><display>false</display><dynamic_creation>false</dynamic_creation><dynamic_creation_script/><dynamic_default_value/><dynamic_ref_qual/><element>u_code_snippet</element><element_reference>false</element_reference><foreign_database/><internal_type display_value="Script">script</internal_type><mandatory>false</mandatory><max_length>4000</max_length><name>u_catalog_config</name><next_element/><primary>false</primary><read_only>false</read_only><read_roles/><reference/><reference_cascade_rule/><reference_floats>false</reference_floats><reference_key/><reference_qual/><reference_qual_condition/><reference_type/><sizeclass/><spell_check>false</spell_check><staged>false</staged><sys_class_name>sys_dictionary</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>brent.llewellyn</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-01-15 20:19:24</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>a996a43fdbef4300497856f3ce96190a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>36</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Code that will be executed by workflow</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_dictionary_u_catalog_config_u_code_snippet</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>brent.llewellyn</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-01-16 14:14:56</sys_updated_on><table_reference>false</table_reference><text_index>false</text_index><unique>false</unique><use_dependent_field>false</use_dependent_field><use_dynamic_default>false</use_dynamic_default><use_reference_qualifier>simple</use_reference_qualifier><virtual>true</virtual><widget/><write_roles/><xml_view>false</xml_view></sys_dictionary></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_b6d1b8b3db238300497856f3ce9619e7
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.CatConfUtils</api_name><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>CatConfUtils</name><script><![CDATA[var CatConfUtils = Class.create();
CatConfUtils.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	
	getCatConfButtonFilter: function(){
		var wfActivity_sysId = this.getParameter('sysparm_sysId');
		var wfActivity = new GlideRecord('wf_activity');
		if(wfActivity.get(wfActivity_sysId)){
			return wfActivity.workflow_version.getDisplayValue();
		}
		return false;
		
	},
	
	type: 'CatConfUtils'
});



CatConfUtils.getCatConf = function(filter){
	var catConfig = new GlideRecord('u_catalog_config');
	catConfig.addEncodedQuery('u_active=true^'+filter);
	catConfig.query();
	while(catConfig.next()){
		GlideEvaluator.evaluateString(catConfig.u_code_snippet.toString());
	}
	
};

CatConfUtils.showCatConfigButton = function(activityObj){
	if(activityObj.vars.var__m_38891b6f0a0a0b1e00efdfdd77602027.advanced_script.indexOf('CatConfUtils') > -1)
		return true;
	return false;
	
};
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>brent.llewellyn</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-01-15 21:09:28</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>b6d1b8b3db238300497856f3ce9619e7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>16</sys_mod_count><sys_name>CatConfUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_b6d1b8b3db238300497856f3ce9619e7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>brent.llewellyn</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-01-16 15:01:47</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_dictionary_u_catalog_config_u_code_snippet
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update><sys_dictionary action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE" element="u_code_snippet" table="u_catalog_config"><active>true</active><array>false</array><array_denormalized>false</array_denormalized><attributes/><audit>false</audit><calculation><![CDATA[// Build snippet to check Conditions
var snippet = "";

if(current.u_condition_type == 'Script'){
	snippet += "// Condition to check before running code execution block\n"+
		"if(conditionScript()){\n";
	
} else if(current.u_condition_type == 'Question Answer'){
	snippet += "// Condition to check before running code execution block\n"+
		"if(current.variables."+current.u_question+" == '"+current.u_answer+"'){\n";
	
}else if(current.u_condition_type == 'Condition Builder'){
	snippet += "// Condition to check before running code execution block\n"+
		"if(GlideFilter.checkRecord(current, '"+current.u_condition+"')){\n";
	
}
var advancedScript;
if(current.u_advanced){
	advancedScript = "    "+new String(current.u_execution_script).replace(/\n/g,"    ")+"\n";
}


// Build snippet to 

if(current.u_type == "Task Assignment"){
	snippet += "    task.assignment_group = '"+current.u_assignment_group+"';\n\n";
	
	if(advancedScript){
		snippet += advancedScript;
	}
	
} else if(current.u_type == "Approval"){
		
	snippet+="    var answer = [];\n";
	
	if(current.u_approval_group)
		snippet+="    answer.push('"+current.u_approval_group.sys_id+"');\n";
	
	if(current.u_approver)
		snippet+="    answer.push('"+current.u_approver.sys_id+"');\n\n";
	
	if(advancedScript)
		snippet += advancedScript+"\n\n";
	
} else if(current.u_type == "SLA"){
	
	var slas = current.u_sla_s.split(",");
	
	snippet += '    current.u_config_sla = "'+slas[0];
	
	for (i = 1; i < slas.length; i++){
		snippet += ','+slas[i];
	}
	
	snippet +='";\n\n';
	
	if(advancedScript)
		snippet += advancedScript;
	
}

if((current.u_condition_type == 'Script') || (current.u_condition_type == 'Question Answer') || (current.u_condition_type == 'Condition Builder')){
	snippet += "}\n\n";
}

if(current.u_condition_type == 'Script'){
	snippet += current.u_condition_script+"\n";
} 

if(current.u_type == "Question Choice"){
	snippet = "";
	
}
]]></calculation><choice/><choice_field/><choice_table/><column_label>Code that will be executed by workflow</column_label><comments/><create_roles/><default_value/><defaultsort/><delete_roles/><dependent/><dependent_on_field/><display>false</display><dynamic_creation>false</dynamic_creation><dynamic_creation_script/><dynamic_default_value/><dynamic_ref_qual/><element>u_code_snippet</element><element_reference>false</element_reference><foreign_database/><internal_type display_value="Script">script</internal_type><mandatory>false</mandatory><max_length>4000</max_length><name>u_catalog_config</name><next_element/><primary>false</primary><read_only>false</read_only><read_roles/><reference/><reference_cascade_rule/><reference_floats>false</reference_floats><reference_key/><reference_qual/><reference_qual_condition/><reference_type/><sizeclass/><spell_check>false</spell_check><staged>false</staged><sys_class_name>sys_dictionary</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>brent.llewellyn</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-01-15 20:19:24</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>a996a43fdbef4300497856f3ce96190a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>37</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Code that will be executed by workflow</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_dictionary_u_catalog_config_u_code_snippet</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>brent.llewellyn</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-01-22 18:53:42</sys_updated_on><table_reference>false</table_reference><text_index>false</text_index><unique>false</unique><use_dependent_field>false</use_dependent_field><use_dynamic_default>false</use_dynamic_default><use_reference_qualifier>simple</use_reference_qualifier><virtual>true</virtual><widget/><write_roles/><xml_view>false</xml_view></sys_dictionary></record_update>
